name: FoodVerse
description:
Food-Verse is your unlimited supply of food from the multiverse. You must pass the trial given by the "Fridgenator" to fill your hunger and level up. Careful, He might test your resolve by throwing a bomb or two at you once in a while.  Each trial gets harder than before with increasing difficulty and additional rewards (Just like life).

Features:

  • Single Tap Mechanics
  • Challenging Trials.
  • Realistic Sound Effects.

Mechanics:  Just Tap or Click on Food to eat/drink it.  Explode bombs by tapping/clicking before they harm you. 
Inspiration: Inspired by the upcoming movie (Doctor Strange and the multiverse of madness) and the all-time famous game (Fruit Ninja).

Team Dervish: Saif (Team Captain- Dev), Azeem Ahmed (Dev), Daniyal Janjua (Dev)UnOfficial Members: 

Bugs:  

  • Forgot to Add Game Pausing.
  • Sound toggle On/Off not implemented.
